name: lucky_spin_v2_backup
description: This table stores backup records of lucky spin events for user accounts in a non-production environment.

columns.name: master_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for each lucky spin transaction record.

columns.name: sym_run_date
columns.description: The date when the lucky spin event was processed.

columns.name: balance
columns.description: The balance amount in the user's account at the time of the lucky spin event.

columns.name: lucky_spin
columns.description: The result of the lucky spin event.

columns.name: lucky_spin_type
columns.description: The type or category of the lucky spin event.

columns.name: acct_open_datetime
columns.description: The timestamp when the user's account was created.

columns.name: total_used_lucky_spin
columns.description: The total number of lucky spins used by the user.

columns.name: prefix_sum_lucky_spin
columns.description: The cumulative sum of lucky spins up to the current event.

columns.name: real_lucky_spin
columns.description: The actual result of the lucky spin event.

columns.name: processing_time
columns.description: The timestamp when the lucky spin event was processed.

columns.name: schema_campaign
columns.description: The schema or campaign associated with the lucky spin event.

columns.name: account_id
columns.description: The unique identifier for the user's account associated with the lucky spin event.
